about_the_game:
Dive into heart-pounding multiplayer battles with Delta Strike, the ultimate first-person shooter experience! Developed with cutting-edge technologies, Delta Strike delivers AAA-quality graphics and performance, ensuring an immersive gaming experience like no other.

Choose your destiny across three intense game modes: Team Deathmatch, Free For All, and Capture the Flag. Whether you’re coordinating strategies with your team, engaging in solo combat, or capturing objectives, Delta Strike offers endless thrills and excitement.

Customize your gameplay with four distinct player classes, each with unique abilities and characteristics. Arm yourself with eight different types of weapons, from rifles to shotguns, and dominate the battlefield with precision and skill.

Voice chat allows for seamless communication with your teammates, while AI players ensure intense battles even in the absence of human opponents. With private and public match options, Delta Strike offers flexibility and variety for every player.

Experience smooth and responsive player movement mechanics, including sliding, jumping, and crouching, as you navigate through dynamic environments. Dominate the competition, climb the leaderboards, and become the ultimate champion in the world of Delta Strike.

Gear up, soldier, and prepare for the ultimate FPS showdown in Delta Strike!

Features:

Dynamic Game Modes: Engage in three exhilarating game modes: Team Deathmatch, Free For All, and Capture the Flag.
Player Classes: Customize your playstyle with four distinct player classes, each offering unique abilities and characteristics.
Diverse Weaponry: Arm yourself with eight different types of weapons, including rifles, shotguns, pistols, grenades, and more.
Voice Chat: Coordinate with your teammates using built-in voice chat, ensuring seamless communication during intense battles.
AI Players: Battle against AI opponents for intense multiplayer action, even when human opponents are scarce.
Private and Public Matches: Choose between private matches for intimate battles with friends or public matches for larger-scale combat.
Responsive Player Movement: Enjoy smooth and responsive player movement mechanics, including sliding, jumping, and crouching.
Immersive Environments: Explore dynamic environments and navigate through intricately designed maps for strategic advantage.
Leaderboards and Ranking: Climb the leaderboards, track your progress, and compete for the top spot in Delta Strike.

content_descriptors.notes:
Delta Strike by Gamesoft Studios contains the following mature content:

Violence: Frequent and intense combat scenarios where players use various weapons such as rifles, shotguns, pistols, grenades, Molotov cocktails, grenade launchers, and knives. Realistic military combat includes blood splatter and wound effects when players are injured or killed.

Blood Effects: Visible blood splatter and wound effects are present. However, there is no excessive gore, such as dismemberment or mutilation.

Mature Language: The game allows for player interactions via voice and text chat, which may include mild to moderate mature language. There is no scripted profanity in the game's character dialogue.

User-Generated Content: Players may encounter mature language or themes through interactions with other players. While Gamesoft Studios encourages a respectful environment, not all player interactions are moderated in real-time.

name: Delta Strike

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel core i3 7th generation / Amd ryzen 3 10th generation or above
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GT 1080 2GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 11th generation/ Amd ryzen 5 3600 or above
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1650 4GB
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Gear up, soldier, and prepare for the ultimate FPS showdown in Delta Strike!
